DataSource.name: DsLoCashOverview

DerivedAttribute.name: paidAmount
DerivedAttribute.value: CASE SdoMain.DocumentType WHEN 'CashCheckIn' THEN ABS(SdoMain.PaidAmount) WHEN 'Expenses' THEN ABS(SdoMain.PaidAmount) ELSE SdoMain.PaidAmount END

DerivedAttribute.name: sort1
DerivedAttribute.value: CASE SdoMain.Phase WHEN 'Initial' THEN '1' WHEN 'Released' THEN '2' WHEN 'Canceled' THEN '3' ELSE '4' END

DerivedAttribute.name: releaseTime
DerivedAttribute.value: CASE SdoMain.Phase WHEN 'Released' THEN SdoMain.ReleaseTime ELSE ' ' END

DerivedAttribute.name: sortReleaseTime
DerivedAttribute.value: CASE SdoMain.Phase WHEN 'Released' THEN SdoMain.ReleaseTime ELSE ' ' END

DataSource.QueryCondition: (SdoMain.DocumentType IN ('CashCheckOut', 'CashCheckIn','Expenses') OR (SdoMain.DocumentType = 'Delivery' AND SdoMain.Phase = 'Released' AND SdoMain.DocTaType = 'CashInvoice')) AND SdoMain.TmgMainPKey = #tmgMainPKey# AND TmgTourObjectRel.TmgTourPKey = #tmgMainPKey#
